snippet: The documents suggest that John C. Liu, the New York City comptroller, was engaged in his campaign on a granular level.
abstract: Federal wiretap application documents containing excerpts from conversations involving New York City Comptroller John C Liu reveal that Liu was engaged in his campaign on a granular level, and also perhaps had closer dealings with fund-raiser Xing Wu Pan than was previously known.

byline.original: By DAVID W. CHEN and BENJAMIN WEISER

lead_paragraph: The documents suggest that John C. Liu, the New York City comptroller, was engaged in his campaign on a granular level.

headline.seo: Excerpts of Wiretaps in Liu Case Are Released
headline.main: Excerpts of Wiretaps in Liu Case Are Released
headline.print_headline: Excerpts Of Wiretaps In Liu Case Are Released

keywords.value: Wiretapping and Other Eavesdropping Devices and Methods
keywords.name: subject
